actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to issue a certain oil and gas lease to the Ballard E Spencer Trust Inc., New Mexico.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to issue an oil and gas lease covering a certain parcel of land in New Mexico, to a certain corporation.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to issue a certain oil and gas lease to the Ballard E Spencer Trust Inc., New Mexico.
